ygData.subject: RE: RE: Lullaby interrupting casters
ygData.msgSnippet: Every one of my banks has the #6 key pointing to Selo s.  It is the most used Bard song, maybe the most used magic effect, in the game.
ygData.messageBody:
Every one of my banks has the #6 key pointing to Selo's. It is the most
used Bard song, maybe the most used magic effect, in the game.

> ----------
> From: Sheldon, Colin[SMTP:Colin.Sheldon@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 5:51 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] RE: Lullaby interrupting casters
>
> From: "Sheldon, Colin" <Colin.Sheldon@...>
>
> <snip>
> The problem for me is being stunned. I'll mash my NumLock key to start
> running, switch to my hotkey bank that holds my meelee and inv slots and
> start swapping, all the sudden I'm not running anymore and/or my Selo's
> has
> been ended. Now I have either stand still and finish swapping weapon &
> shield for an instrument or I have to mash the NumLock again, switch back
> to
> my songs hotkey bank, hit Selo's (several times lately before it works),
> switch back to my slots bank, finish swapping items and hope I'm still
> alive
> in the time that it took to do the above.
> <snip>
>
> This happened to me all of the time. To solve it, I put Selo's into the
> #6
> spot on my inventory hotkey bank. If I get stunned or Selo's stops whilst
> I
> am trying to switch to the drum, I just hit "numlock" to start running,
> "6"
> to get Selo's going, and then try to complete the weapon/drum switch --
> none
> of that "shift-X" crap is needed to switch hotkey banks.
>
> Ranulf
> Bard of the 13th Measure
> Tunare Server
>
